scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TAMORA
line: How I have govern'd our determined jest?

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TAMORA
line: Yield to his humour, smooth and speak him fair,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TAMORA
line: And tarry with him till I turn again.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Aside  I know them all, though they suppose me mad,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And will o'erreach them in their own devices:

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: A pair of cursed hell-hounds and their dam!

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: DEMETRIUS
line: Madam, depart at pleasure; leave us here.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TAMORA
line: Farewell, Andronicus: Revenge now goes

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TAMORA
line: To lay a complot to betray thy foes.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: I know thou dost; and, sweet Revenge, farewell.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: CHIRON
line: Tell us, old man, how shall we be employ'd?

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Tut, I have work enough for you to do.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Publius, come hither, Caius, and Valentine!

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: PUBLIUS
line: What is your will?

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Know you these two?

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: PUBLIUS
line: The empress' sons, I take them, Chiron and Demetrius.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Fie, Publius, fie! thou art too much deceived;

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: The one is Murder, Rape is the other's name;

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And therefore bind them, gentle Publius.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Caius and Valentine, lay hands on them.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Oft have you heard me wish for such an hour,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And now I find it; therefore bind them sure,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And stop their mouths, if they begin to cry.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: CHIRON
line: Villains, forbear! we are the empress' sons.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: PUBLIUS
line: And therefore do we what we are commanded.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: PUBLIUS
line: Stop close their mouths, let them not speak a word.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: PUBLIUS
line: Is he sure bound? look that you bind them fast.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Come, come, Lavinia; look, thy foes are bound.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Sirs, stop their mouths, let them not speak to me;

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: But let them hear what fearful words I utter.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: O villains, Chiron and Demetrius!

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Here stands the spring whom you have stain'd with mud,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: This goodly summer with your winter mix'd.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: You kill'd her husband, and for that vile fault

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Two of her brothers were condemn'd to death,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: My hand cut off and made a merry jest;

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Both her sweet hands, her tongue, and that more dear

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Than hands or tongue, her spotless chastity,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Inhuman traitors, you constrain'd and forced.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: What would you say, if I should let you speak?

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Villains, for shame you could not beg for grace.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Hark, wretches! how I mean to martyr you.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: This one hand yet is left to cut your throats,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Whilst that Lavinia 'tween her stumps doth hold

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: The basin that receives your guilty blood.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: You know your mother means to feast with me,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And calls herself Revenge, and thinks me mad:

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Hark, villains! I will grind your bones to dust

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And with your blood and it I'll make a paste,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And of the paste a coffin I will rear

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And make two pasties of your shameful heads,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And bid that strumpet, your unhallow'd dam,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Like to the earth swallow her own increase.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: This is the feast that I have bid her to,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And this the banquet she shall surfeit on;

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: For worse than Philomel you used my daughter,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And worse than Progne I will be revenged:

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And now prepare your throats. Lavinia, come,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Receive the blood: and when that they are dead,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Let me go grind their bones to powder small

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And with this hateful liquor temper it;

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And in that paste let their vile heads be baked.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Come, come, be every one officious

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: To make this banquet; which I wish may prove

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: More stern and bloody than the Centaurs' feast.

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: So, now bring them in, for I'll play the cook,

scene: SCENE II.  Rome. Before TITUS's house.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And see them ready 'gainst their mother comes.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Uncle Marcus, since it is my father's mind

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: That I repair to Rome, I am content.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: First Goth
line: And ours with thine, befall what fortune will.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Good uncle, take you in this barbarous Moor,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: This ravenous tiger, this accursed devil;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Let him receive no sustenance, fetter him

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Till he be brought unto the empress' face,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: For testimony of her foul proceedings:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: And see the ambush of our friends be strong;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: I fear the emperor means no good to us.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: Some devil whisper curses in mine ear,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: And prompt me, that my tongue may utter forth

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: The venomous malice of my swelling heart!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Away, inhuman dog! unhallow'd slave!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Sirs, help our uncle to convey him in.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: The trumpets show the emperor is at hand.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: What, hath the firmament more suns than one?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: What boots it thee to call thyself a sun?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Rome's emperor, and nephew, break the parle;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: These quarrels must be quietly debated.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: The feast is ready, which the careful Titus

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Hath ordain'd to an honourable end,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: For peace, for love, for league, and good to Rome:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Please you, therefore, draw nigh, and take your places.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: Marcus, we will.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Welcome, my gracious lord; welcome, dread queen;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Welcome, ye warlike Goths; welcome, Lucius;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And welcome, all: although the cheer be poor,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: 'Twill fill your stomachs; please you eat of it.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: Why art thou thus attired, Andronicus?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Because I would be sure to have all well,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: To entertain your highness and your empress.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TAMORA
line: We are beholding to you, good Andronicus.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: An if your highness knew my heart, you were.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: My lord the emperor, resolve me this:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Was it well done of rash Virginius

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: To slay his daughter with his own right hand,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Because she was enforced, stain'd, and deflower'd?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: It was, Andronicus.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Your reason, mighty lord?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: Because the girl should not survive her shame,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: And by her presence still renew his sorrows.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: A reason mighty, strong, and effectual;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: A pattern, precedent, and lively warrant,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: For me, most wretched, to perform the like.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Die, die, Lavinia, and thy shame with thee;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And, with thy shame, thy father's sorrow die!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: What hast thou done, unnatural and unkind?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Kill'd her, for whom my tears have made me blind.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: I am as woful as Virginius was,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And have a thousand times more cause than he

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: To do this outrage: and it now is done.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: What, was she ravish'd? tell who did the deed.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Will't please you eat? will't please your

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: highness feed?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TAMORA
line: Why hast thou slain thine only daughter thus?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Not I; 'twas Chiron and Demetrius:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: They ravish'd her, and cut away her tongue;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: And they, 'twas they, that did her all this wrong.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: Go fetch them hither to us presently.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Why, there they are both, baked in that pie;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Whereof their mother daintily hath fed,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: Eating the flesh that she herself hath bred.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: TITUS ANDRONICUS
line: 'Tis true, 'tis true; witness my knife's sharp point.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: SATURNINUS
line: Die, frantic wretch, for this accursed deed!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Can the son's eye behold his father bleed?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: There's meed for meed, death for a deadly deed!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: You sad-faced men, people and sons of Rome,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: By uproar sever'd, like a flight of fowl

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Scatter'd by winds and high tempestuous gusts,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: O, let me teach you how to knit again

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: This scatter'd corn into one mutual sheaf,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: These broken limbs again into one body;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Lest Rome herself be bane unto herself,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: And she whom mighty kingdoms court'sy to,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Like a forlorn and desperate castaway,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Do shameful execution on herself.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: But if my frosty signs and chaps of age,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Grave witnesses of true experience,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Cannot induce you to attend my words,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Speak, Rome's dear friend, as erst our ancestor,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: When with his solemn tongue he did discourse

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: To love-sick Dido's sad attending ear

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: The story of that baleful burning night

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: When subtle Greeks surprised King Priam's Troy,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Tell us what Sinon hath bewitch'd our ears,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Or who hath brought the fatal engine in

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: That gives our Troy, our Rome, the civil wound.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: My heart is not compact of flint nor steel;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Nor can I utter all our bitter grief,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: But floods of tears will drown my oratory,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: And break my utterance, even in the time

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: When it should move you to attend me most,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Lending your kind commiseration.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Here is a captain, let him tell the tale;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Your hearts will throb and weep to hear him speak.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Then, noble auditory, be it known to you,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: That cursed Chiron and Demetrius

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Were they that murdered our emperor's brother;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: And they it were that ravished our sister:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: For their fell faults our brothers were beheaded;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Our father's tears despised, and basely cozen'd

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Of that true hand that fought Rome's quarrel out,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: And sent her enemies unto the grave.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Lastly, myself unkindly banished,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: The gates shut on me, and turn'd weeping out,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: To beg relief among Rome's enemies:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Who drown'd their enmity in my true tears.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: And oped their arms to embrace me as a friend.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: I am the turned forth, be it known to you,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: That have preserved her welfare in my blood;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: And from her bosom took the enemy's point,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Sheathing the steel in my adventurous body.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Alas, you know I am no vaunter, I;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: My scars can witness, dumb although they are,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: That my report is just and full of truth.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: But, soft! methinks I do digress too much,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Citing my worthless praise: O, pardon me;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: For when no friends are by, men praise themselves.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Now is my turn to speak. Behold this child:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Of this was Tamora delivered;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: The issue of an irreligious Moor,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Chief architect and plotter of these woes:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: The villain is alive in Titus' house,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: And as he is, to witness this is true.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Now judge what cause had Titus to revenge

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: These wrongs, unspeakable, past patience,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Or more than any living man could bear.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Now you have heard the truth, what say you, Romans?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Have we done aught amiss,--show us wherein,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: And, from the place where you behold us now,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: The poor remainder of Andronici

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Will, hand in hand, all headlong cast us down.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: And on the ragged stones beat forth our brains,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: And make a mutual closure of our house.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Speak, Romans, speak; and if you say we shall,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Lo, hand in hand, Lucius and I will fall.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AEMILIUS
line: Come, come, thou reverend man of Rome,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AEMILIUS
line: And bring our emperor gently in thy hand,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AEMILIUS
line: Lucius our emperor; for well I know

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AEMILIUS
line: The common voice do cry it shall be so.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: All
line: Lucius, all hail, Rome's royal emperor!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Go, go into old Titus' sorrowful house,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: And hither hale that misbelieving Moor,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: To be adjudged some direful slaughtering death,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: As punishment for his most wicked life.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: All
line: Lucius, all hail, Rome's gracious governor!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Thanks, gentle Romans: may I govern so,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: To heal Rome's harms, and wipe away her woe!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: But, gentle people, give me aim awhile,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: For nature puts me to a heavy task:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Stand all aloof: but, uncle, draw you near,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: To shed obsequious tears upon this trunk.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: O, take this warm kiss on thy pale cold lips,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: These sorrowful drops upon thy blood-stain'd face,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: The last true duties of thy noble son!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Tear for tear, and loving kiss for kiss,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Thy brother Marcus tenders on thy lips:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: O were the sum of these that I should pay

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: MARCUS ANDRONICUS
line: Countless and infinite, yet would I pay them!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Come hither, boy; come, come, and learn of us

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: To melt in showers: thy grandsire loved thee well:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Many a time he danced thee on his knee,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Sung thee asleep, his loving breast thy pillow:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Many a matter hath he told to thee,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Meet and agreeing with thine infancy;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: In that respect, then, like a loving child,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Shed yet some small drops from thy tender spring,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Because kind nature doth require it so:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Friends should associate friends in grief and woe:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Bid him farewell; commit him to the grave;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Do him that kindness, and take leave of him.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: Young LUCIUS
line: O grandsire, grandsire! even with all my heart

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: Young LUCIUS
line: Would I were dead, so you did live again!

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: Young LUCIUS
line: O Lord, I cannot speak to him for weeping;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: Young LUCIUS
line: My tears will choke me, if I ope my mouth.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AEMILIUS
line: You sad Andronici, have done with woes:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AEMILIUS
line: Give sentence on this execrable wretch,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AEMILIUS
line: That hath been breeder of these dire events.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Set him breast-deep in earth, and famish him;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: There let him stand, and rave, and cry for food;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: If any one relieves or pities him,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: For the offence he dies. This is our doom:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Some stay to see him fasten'd in the earth.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: O, why should wrath be mute, and fury dumb?

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: I am no baby, I, that with base prayers

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: I should repent the evils I have done:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: Ten thousand worse than ever yet I did

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: Would I perform, if I might have my will;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: If one good deed in all my life I did,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: AARON
line: I do repent it from my very soul.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Some loving friends convey the emperor hence,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: And give him burial in his father's grave:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: My father and Lavinia shall forthwith

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Be closed in our household's monument.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: As for that heinous tiger, Tamora,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: No funeral rite, nor man m mourning weeds,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: No mournful bell shall ring her burial;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: But throw her forth to beasts and birds of prey:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Her life was beast-like, and devoid of pity;

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: And, being so, shall have like want of pity.

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: See justice done on Aaron, that damn'd Moor,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: By whom our heavy haps had their beginning:

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: Then, afterwards, to order well the state,

scene: SCENE III.  Court of TITUS's house. A banquet set out.
speaker: LUCIUS
line: That like events may ne'er it ruinate.
